## PolySyncIterable.every() method

Returns `true` if calling `func(element)` returns `true` for every element, and `false` otherwise

**Signature:**

```typescript
every(func: IndexedPredicate<T>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

func


</td><td>

[IndexedPredicate](./polyethylene.indexedpredicate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>

A function to be called on the elements of the iteration


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

Whether calling `func` returned `true` for all elements.

## Remarks

If a call to `func(element)` returns `false`<!-- -->, no more elements are iterated.
